org.springframework.web.bind.annotation

注释类型 PutMapping


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @RequestMapping(method=PUT)
public @interface PutMapping
    Annotation for mapping HTTP PUT requests onto specific handler methods.

    Specifically, @PutMapping is a composed annotation that acts as a shortcut for @RequestMapping(method = RequestMethod.PUT).

    从以下版本开始:
    4.3
    另请参阅:
    GetMapping, PostMapping, DeleteMapping, PatchMapping, RequestMapping

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      String[] consumes
      Alias for RequestMapping.consumes().
      String[] headers
      Alias for RequestMapping.headers().
      String name
      Alias for RequestMapping.name().
      String[] params
      Alias for RequestMapping.params().
      String[] path
      Alias for RequestMapping.path().
      String[] produces
      Alias for RequestMapping.produces().
      String[] value
      Alias for RequestMapping.value().

public abstract String name
